FdoINetworkCommand Class Reference

#include <INetwork.h>

Inherits FdoICommand.

Inherited by FdoINetworkAllPathsCommand, FdoINetworkNearestNeighborsCommand, FdoINetworkReachableNodesCommand, FdoINetworkReachingNodesCommand, FdoINetworkShortestPathCommand, FdoINetworkTSPCommand, and FdoINetworkWithinCostCommand.

Inheritance diagram for FdoINetworkCommand:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The FdoINetworkCommand is the base of all the FDO network analysis comands.

Note:
This Help topic is provided for informational use only. There is no interface or support provided. Autodesk reserves the right to change the software related to the content herein.

Definition at line 36 of file INetwork.h.


Public Member Functions

virtual FDO_API FdoINetworkReader * Execute ()=0
 This method performs the network analysis and returns a network path reader.
virtual FDO_API double GetMaximumCost ()=0
 This method is used to get the maximum cost value.
virtual FDO_API int GetMaximumDepth ()=0
 Gets the maximum depth value.
virtual FDO_API GisString * GetNetworkLayerName ()=0
 Gets the name of the class to be operated upon as an FdoIdentifier.
virtual FDO_API GisString * GetNetworkName ()=0
 Gets the name of the network.
virtual FDO_API void SetExcludeNodes (GisString *className, FdoFilter *filter)=0
 This method is used to set an optional filter that resolve to a set of nodes that need to be excluded.
virtual FDO_API void SetIncludeNodes (GisString *className, FdoFilter *filter)=0
 This method is used to set an optional filter that resolve to a set of nodes that need to be included.
virtual FDO_API void SetMaximumCost (double value)=0
 This method is used to set an optional maximum cost value. This value will be used to limit the network analysis to a given cost.
virtual FDO_API void SetMaximumDepth (int value)=0
 This method is used to set an optional maximum depth value. This value will be used to limit the network analysis to a given depth. A depth of 1 limits the analysis to the adjacent nodes.
virtual FDO_API void SetNetworkLayerName (GisString *value)=0
 This method is used to set the name of the layer that will be used for the network analysis. If the layer is not set, the analysis will be performed across all layers.
virtual FDO_API void SetNetworkName (GisString *value)=0
 This method is used to set the name of the network that will be used for the network analysis.
